summary: Installment #4 of the More Colorful Resources series. More Colorful Trees adds standalone meshes of both pines, aspens, and shrubs with a small sample mod to see what the colors look like in game, they are outside Whiterun going towards the Western watchtower.
descriptionHtml:
More Colorful Trees & Shrubs
Author: Mentha
Version: 1.2
Initial Release Date: October 29, 2012
Category: Resources

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Requirements:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Skyrim


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Installment #4 of the More Colorful Resources series. More Colorful Trees adds standalone meshes of both pines and aspens with a small sample mod to see what the colors look like in game, they are outside Whiterun going towards the Western watchtower.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Details:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

I had to wonder where the burnt and dead trees were. All the trees were the same color. While I'm sure a lot of work went into the trees to make them move and such, I felt like Bethesda sold themselves short with the lack of interesting foliage in Skyrim. I got tired of stamping duplicate plants and trees all over the place so I decided to try my hand at recoloring them for my own enjoyment. More Colorful Trees adds new colors to vanilla trees using vanilla meshes with altered textures to make a bigger variety of colors for the modder. They will not alter any of the trees in game, but are standalone. I recolored these trees with my mod in mind, but I decided to share these as I'm pretty pleased with (most) of the results. I do realize some colors do not match the file names. If it bothers you, change them. I only ask you give credit.

Please note none of the snow trees or shrubs are recolored. I figured the difference in color wouldn't be seen anyway.



Included in Version 1.0:

Each of the Aspen trees (1-6) in 7 colors
Each of the pine trees (1-5) in 6 colors
This time I tried to keep the colors more natural, one of the aspens looks like a flowering plum, but I like the effect.
small esp with one tree of each color put on the road to the Western Watchtower from Whiterun.

Included in 1.1
LOD trees for the aspens. The DDS files are there for the pines, I just haven't assigned them to meshes.

Included in 1.2
LOD meshes for pine forest trees
2 different Fall Forest shrubs in 10 colors
3 different pine shrubs in 7 colors
2 different Reach scrubs in 7 colors
3 different Tundra scrubs in 7 colors
10 different Tundra shrubs in 7 different colors
Vine maple in 7 colors
3 different Yellow shrubs in 7 colors


Future plans:
[s]Add shrubs to esp for easier transfer to your mod. Add screenshots of shrubs. [/s]


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Skyrim:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70307/?]More Colorful Critters[/url] 
Over 150 more critters to shout at.

adds over 300 female clothes, shoes, boots, sandals, wedding wreaths, and gloves to the game all craftable
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25701/?]More Colorful Alchemy Plants[/url]
This is a resource with a small sample mod to show you what the plants look like in the game. Each plant has a corresponding ingredient. The sample plants are behind Jorrvaskr.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25939/?]More Colorful Shrooms[/url]
This is a resource with a small sample mod to show you what the mushrooms look like in the game. Each 'shroom has a corresponding ingredient. The 'shrooms in game are on the road in front of Pelagia Farm.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25960/?]More Colorful Ferns[/url]
This is a resource with a small sample mod to show you what the plants look like in the game. The plants in game are on the grounds around Jorrvaskr.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26057/?]Markarth Botanical Gardens[/url]
An eye candy mod with a living area, new alchemy plants, and a new world space to call home. Live there, hunt there, or harvest and run. 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26485/?]Falkreath Overlook Farmhouse[/url]
A small house above Falkreath with lots of landscaping, new alchemy plants, and crafting and storage areas. 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26192/?]More Colorful Trees & Shrubs[/url]
Tree resource with a small sample mod to show the trees in game. Look on the road between the western watchtower and Whiterun stables.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26632/?]Riften Well House[/url]
Argonian house next to Riften South Gate. Inspired by Wolverine Hall Well House by Korana for Morrowind. 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28228/?]Solitude Tree House Shack [/url]
(optional General Stores compatibility) 
Small house with a lot of landscaping on the island next to Solitude Sawmill.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70193/?]A Place to Stay[/url]
Inspired by "A Good Place to Stay" mod by Simstar for Morrowind. Adds a Dwemer house next to Pelagia Farm with mannequins for each of the types of armor in Skyrim with quite a few to spare for armor mods.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Change log:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1.0
Release

1.1
Added LOD trees for the Aspens, (don't know why but there is no 04 Lod tree) It's not forgotten just not provided by Bethesda. I have the files ready for the pine trees, I just need more time to change the nifs. I do not know how to hook up the trees to their own LOD files. I just made them for request.

1.2
Added LOD trees for pines, added shrubs in 7-10 colors/specific nif
No screen shots yet, but will have them within a day or so.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Requests:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


You may ask for another color of the default meshes, but there is no guarantee that it will look nice. Some colors, like white, just don't show up right on the image files. I do not do remodeling so if you want me to slash and paste something together, I probably will not be able to do that.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Installation:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1) Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into a temporary folder
2) Cut & Paste files to your Data folder
3) Turn on the mod or use the CK to add the items to your mod.
4) Have fun


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Un-Installation:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1) Delete the files associated with the mod
2) Remove any meshes used from your .esp



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Incompatibility:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Any mod that changes the road to the Western Watchtower, if you do decide to use the mod, otherwise none.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bugs:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

I make no guarantee that your computer will not explode.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Credits:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

To The Good Lord
Bethesda for creating Skyrim.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Tools Used:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Nifskope
GIMP
CK

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You may use these files for your mod as long as you do not use them for adult content mods.

You may not use my files if you plan to ask for a donation or charge for your mod.

Otherwise, you do not have to ask for permission but please credit me with a link back to this upload.

You may NOT upload this file to any other site without my permission. You may not put them in any compilation of resources without my permission. It's not that I will say no, but I'm nosy and like to see other people's work.

Please do be kind and leave me a link so I may view your work.
author: Mentha
